0.5.name: wordpress/macks-nascar-news-feed
0.5.description:
Mack's NASCAR News Feed plugin incorporates an external RSS news feed into a cool looking Flash news feed. The feed moves from bottom to top, with a nice NASCAR graphic, followed by headlines and stories. You can click on a story title or summary to see the actual page where it is posted. You can also edit the width and height of the plugin to suit your needs. Finally, you can select how many articles you want to appear in the feed: 1 to 10.

Relevant Keywords: cars, autos, racing, car racing, auto racing, stock car, stock cars, stock car racing, motorsports, NASCAR, NASCAR racing, NASCAR news, NASCAR results, NASCAR drivers, NASCAR races

Thanks,

Mack Bincroft
